title: Process a Lost Policy Finder Request
description: A person believes their deceased relative had a life insurance policy with the company but cannot find it.

tasks.description: Collect the deceased person's information (full name, date of birth, SSN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the information needed to search the system.

tasks.description: Search the policy administration system for any policies under the deceased's name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a search and finds an active policy.

tasks.description: If a policy is found, inform the caller and begin the standard claim process, starting with verifying they are a beneficiary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the caller that a policy was found and proceeds to the first step of the claims process.
